answers.answer: I have three weeks left, too! :) But I have had a TON of mucousy discharge, which means a thinning cervix! As of Tuesday, I was dilated to a one too. But she's considering inducing me before the 13th because of my blood pressure, headaches, and other symptoms. I go back in on Tuesday and I'm planning on talking to her about it then. :)
aw so we have the same due date!what are you having?good luck with your apt next week!
I'm having a little girl, named Lillith (going by Lily, though).How about you? :D
another lil boyour oldest is 2we are gonna name him Ayden Alexander :D
My c section is next wk n another boy for me

My c-section is scheduled for Dec. 28 but alot of my friends and family don't think I will make it that far.  I have my last 2 week appt. tomorrow and I am hoping she might be able to give me an idea of possible earlier delivery.  I am also planning to travel next week and I will be checking about that.  Hope everyone else is doing well!

I am due Dec 8, but have an induction scheduled for Dec 1 because my last labor was so fast.  I have another u/s tomorrow though because my belly is measuring small, so if baby girl's growth dropped off at all from 34 weeks I'll meet her sooner.

In the last week I've had to have blood work done, I'm doing a 24 hour urine collection, and I've got many of the signs of preeclampsia (headaches, blurry vision, seeing sparks, high blood pressure), so the doctor is seriously considering inducing. Which is fine with me at this point because Lily is full term. I just want to be able to get through Thanksgiving because it's the ONE thing I've been craving since we found out I was pregnant. :)

At 35 weeks, I have been having lots of urine test work being done due to a high Blood Pressure, Also the scan shows a nuchal cord single loop around the neck of the baby!! My Due date is Dec 31st...The doc doesnt think I will be able to pull it thru the due date, She plans to induce me by Dec 10nth. or may be go into a C section!!..Lets hope it goes fine...Im not sure if I would be full term at 36-37 weeks...Wanting to know!! Also wanting to know if A C section is necessary in my case!!

I am due in a week or less - depending on which date I go by.  As of last Tuesday at the doctor's appt. I was 1cm dialated and 30-40% effaced.  My next appointment is this Tuesday and I am sooo ready to have this baby!! :-)

question: HEY EVERYONE-HOWS EVERYONE DOING!NOT MUCH LONGER NOW , HOWS EVERYONE FEELING?I HAVE 3 WKS LEFTAND I GOT CHECKED LAST WEEK AND IM DIALATED TO A "1"SO THEIRS A LITTLE BIT OF PROGRESS!JUST SO ANXIOUS FOR MY BABY AYDEN TO BE HERE!
title: GETTING CLOSE!
